Questions.Question: Can you suffer identity theft booking a trip in a travel agency?
Questions.Explanation: Identity theft can occur if someone gains access to your personal information, such as your name, address or credit card details, while processing your booking. It is important to be careful and protect your personal information whether you book online or in person.

No

Questions.Question: You are reading the newspaper online, but the letters are too small. What do you do?
Questions.Explanation: If the letters are too small when you read the newspaper online, you can adjust the font size in the website settings. Most websites allow you to increase or decrease the font size to make reading more comfortable. This way you can continue reading without difficulty.

Answers.Text: Adjust the font size in the website settings
Ignore the problem and read on
Close the website and look for a printed newspaper
Buy a new computer with a bigger screen

Answers.Text: To protect your accounts from unauthorised access
To impress your friends with your technical savvy
To make it easier for you to remember your login details
To get special discounts on electronic services

Questions.Question: Online leisure activities can bring entertainment right to your doorstep.
It is safe to click on links in emails that promise big prizes or lottery winnings.
Questions.Explanation: Clicking on links in emails promising big prizes or lottery winnings can be risky. These emails may be scams aimed at stealing personal information or spreading harmful viruses.
